para:
This option specifies the input and output format for the time. Examples are:
"h:mm:ss AP" - hour without leading zero and range 1-12, AM/PM display. "hh:mm:ss AP" - hour with leading zero and range 1-12, AM/PM display. "H:mm:ss" - hour without leading zero and range 0-23. "HH:mm:ss" - hour with leading zero and range 0-23.
